title: Dear hosters, you are selling wood, not furniture
summary:
Earlier, I wrote that there isn’t just one type of cloud; it ranges from renting out servers to fully managed office software as a service.
One relevant type of cloud use is what’s informally called “cloud-native.” I wrote in that earlier page that a “cloud-native developer” does not work based on servers. If you rent out virtual servers and call yourself a cloud company, a cloud-native developer won’t understand you at all.
